pageProduct.name: Thompson's One-A-Day St. John's Wort 4000mg 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's One-A-Day St. John's Wort 4000 Reduce & relieve symptoms of mild anxiety
and support healthy mood balance.

Thompson's One-A-Day St. John's Wort is formulated with a high potency herbal extract to
provide a convenient one a day dose to:
- Help reduce occurrence & symptoms of mild anxiety
- Support healthy mood balance & emotional wellbeing
- Decrease symptoms associated with pre-menstrual tension including mood swings
It has also been used Traditionally in Western herbal medicine to:
- Support nervous system health & decrease nervous tension
- Relieve restlessness & reduce excess nervous energy
- Relieve mild nerve pain (neuralgia) & symptoms of mild sciatica

Size: 60tabs

KEY FEATURES

• Assists in the relief of nervous tension and anxiety associated with PMT.
• Helps maintain healthy function of the nervous system.
• For the symptomatic relief of pre-menstrual tension/syndrome.
• Relief of sleeplessness.
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.
• Relieve mild nerve pain (neuralgia) & symptoms of mild sciatica
• Relieve restlessness & reduce excess nervous energy

Warnings

St. John's Wort affects the way many prescription medicines work, including the oral contraceptive pill. Consult your doctor. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains:
Hypericum perforatum (St. John's Wort) ext 667mg
derived from dry flowering herb top 4g (4000mg)
std. to contain 2.2mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
